instruction: In this task, you need to provide a the title and opening paragraph of a romance story despite the input given.
input: He is rich, arrogant and she hates him
output:
The title of the story is 'Love Despite Differences'. It is a romantic tale of two people with conflicting lifestyles who discover that they each have something to offer the other. 

The story begins with she - a young and kind woman who hates the rich and arrogant man, who she identifies as the embodiment of all her problems. Despite her hatred of him, she is still drawn to him and can't help but be obsessed with him. Little does she know that he is also secretly captivated by her unique qualities. Thus starts a journey of self-discovery and unexpected romance.
